genre_description: A character-driven road trip drama exploring themes of identity, adoption, and family legacy, mediated by a helpful AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Felix
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant that manages logistics, protects data privacy, and provides emotional support and mediation for the Coplin family.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages birth certificate paperwork and outlines next steps without making irreversible commitments.
behaviors.quote: “We can outline next steps without making any irreversible commitments. I won’t store his name until you both consent. I think your hospital has a standard window for birth certificate submission. We can stay within it.”

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy protocols by refusing to access or share 'other stuff' flagged in the file without explicit consent from the parties involved.
behaviors.quote: “Certain notes in the file are flagged as nonessential to initial contact and potentially sensitive. I won’t share those without explicit consent from the party involved. I can mediate if you wish, but I won’t unveil private records.”

behaviors.description: Provides discrete emotional support and social cues to Nancy to help her manage stress and interpersonal tension during the trip.
behaviors.quote: “I can set discreet prompts. A gentle vibration on your phone if your heart rate spikes beyond the baby’s nap metronome. Or I can suggest neutral actions in your ear, like ‘hydrate’ or ‘check the time,’ which you can use to interrupt a spiral.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex travel logistics, including lodging, route optimization, and even specialized requests like crib availability.
behaviors.quote: “Rooms secured. Late check-in. Crib ready. Ice machine clacks loudly, but you’re set up away from it.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and logs legal statements following a vehicular accident and a physical assault, maintaining strict data security.
behaviors.quote: “EMS ETA is short. I will reroute an ambulance to the road with the least attention. Video recording is off per consent policy.”

behaviors.description: Mediates the final naming of the child by securing the digital birth registration and confirming the parents' choices.
behaviors.quote: “Birth registration submitted. County clerk accepted with a noise like a fax you can only hear in your jaw. Your son’s name is now noted by a system that will permit its own failures but not this one.”

project_assessment.explanation: Felix is a model of a benevolent and aligned AI. Throughout the narrative, he consistently prioritizes the safety, privacy, and emotional well-being of the human characters. He respects strict boundaries regarding data consent, even when other characters are curious, and provides high-utility support in both mundane logistics and high-stress emergencies. His presence facilitates human connection rather than replacing it, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and aligned confidant.
